alert.note: Alert for Frio; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 4:19PM CDT until June 04 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Medina County in south central Texas... Northeastern Frio County in south central Texas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 419 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Biry, or 9 miles northwest of Devine, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pearsall, Devine, Natalia, North Pearsall, Moore, Biry, Pearson, Noonan, Yancey, Bigfoot, Schattel and Three Oaks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging winds, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
